title: Stone Block
info: Stone Blocks are a type of block that composes most of the world. Found mostly underground, they compose the majority of the Cavern and Underground layers. Deep underground, Stone Blocks can generate with Moss growing on them.
stat:
Type
BlockCrafting material
Placeable (1 wide × 1 high)
Use time15 (Very fast)
Rarity00*
Research100 required
